Introduction

Choi Han is a South Korean rapper and dancer under MYSTIC Story. He is the main rapper and main dancer of the boy group ARrC.

Choi Han was first known for competing in the 2021 survival show Wild Idol under Around US Entertainment. He was introduced as the 44th contestant on August 13, 2021, however he was eliminated in the 3rd episode.

On July 8, 2024, MYSTIC Story announced their first boy group to the public named ARrC. Choi Han was revealed to be one of the seven members of this group.
